info.name: Backlog Postman Collection EN
info.description:
## About Backlog

Backlog is a popular cloud-based project management SaaS in Japan.

request.description:
# Description

Returns information about your space.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-space/

# Description

Returns recent updates in your space.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-recent-updates/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Returns logo image of your space.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-space-logo/

# Description

Returns space notification.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-space-notification/

# Description

Updates space notification.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-space-notification/

# Description

Returns information about space disk usage.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-space-disk-usage/

# Description

Posts an attachment file for issue or wiki. Returns id of the attachment file.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/post-attachment-file/

# Description

Returns list of users in your space.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-user-list/

# Description

Returns information about user.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-user/

# Description

Adds new user to the space.
“Project Administrator” cannot add “Admin” user.
You can’t use this API at backlog.com space.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-user/

urlencoded.description: Administrator(1) Normal User(2) Reporter(3) Viewer(4) Guest Reporter(5) Guest Viewer(6) : roleType (Required)

request.description:
# Description

Updates information about user.
You can’t use this API at backlog.com space.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-user/

urlencoded.description: Administrator(1) Normal User(2) Reporter(3) Viewer(4) Guest Reporter(5) Guest Viewer(6) : roleType

request.description:
# Description

Deletes user from the space.
You can’t use this API at backlog.com space.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-user/

# Description

Returns own information about user.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-own-user/

# Description

Downloads user icon.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-user-icon/

# Description

Returns user’s recent updates

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-user-recent-updates/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Returns the list of stars that user received.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-received-star-list/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Returns number of stars that user received.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/count-user-received-stars/

item.name: Get List of Recently Viewed Issues

request.description:
# Description

Returns list of issues which the user viewed recently.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-recently-viewed-issues/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

item.name: Get List of Recently Viewed Projects

request.description:
# Description

Returns list of projects which the user viewed recently.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-recently-viewed-projects/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

item.name: Get List of Recently Viewed Wikis

request.description:
# Description

Returns list of Wikis which the user viewed recently.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-recently-viewed-wikis/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description


                 warning
     
      Deprecated API
    
  This API has been deprecated and is no longer recommended for use. Please replace it with Get List of Teams.


# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-groups/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description


                 warning
     
      Deprecated API
    
  This API has been deprecated and is no longer recommended for use. Please replace it with Add Team.


# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-group/

urlencoded.description: User ID added to the group : members[]

request.description:
# Description


                 warning

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-group/

                 warning
     
      Deprecated API
    
  This API has been deprecated and is no longer recommended for use. Please replace it with Update Team.

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-group/

urlencoded.description: User ID added to the group : members[]

request.description:
# Description


                 warning
     
      Deprecated API
    
  This API has been deprecated and is no longer recommended for use. Please replace it with Delete Team.


# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-group/

# Description


                 warning
     
      Deprecated API
    
  This API has been deprecated and is no longer recommended for use. Please replace it with Get Status List of Project.


# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-status-list/

# Description

Returns list of status in the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-status-list-of-project/

# Description

Returns list of priorities.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-priority-list/

# Description

Returns list of resolutions.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-resolution-list/

# Description

Returns list of projects.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-project-list/

query.description: For unspecified parameters, this form returns all projects. For ‘false’ parameters, it returns unarchived projects. For ‘true’ parameters, it returns archived projects. : archived
Only applies to administrators. If ‘true,’ it returns all projects. If ‘false,’ it returns only projects they have joined (set to ‘false’ by default). : all

request.description:
# Description

Adds new project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-project/

urlencoded.description: Project Key (Uppercase letters (A-Z), numbers (0-9) and underscore (_) can be used.) : key (Required)
Allow project administrators to manage each other : projectLeaderCanEditProjectLeader

request.description:
# Description

Returns information about project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-project/

# Description

Updates information about project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-project/

urlencoded.description: Allow project administrators to manage each other : projectLeaderCanEditProjectLeader

request.description:
# Description

Deletes project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-project/

# Description

Downloads project icon.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-project-icon/

# Description

Returns recent update in the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-project-recent-updates/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Adds user to list of project members.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-project-user/

# Description

Returns list of project members.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-project-user-list/

query.description: Set to true to exclude members that part of project groups and false to get all members. Default is false. : excludeGroupMembers

request.description:
# Description

Removes user from list project members.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-project-user/

# Description

Adds “Project Administrator” role to user

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-project-administrator/

# Description

Returns list of users who has Project Administrator role

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-project-administrators/

# Description

Removes Project Administrator role from user

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-project-administrator/

# Description

Adds new Status to the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-status/

urlencoded.description: Background color: You can use the below colors”#ea2c00””#e87758””#e07b9a””#868cb7””#3b9dbd””#4caf93””#b0be3c””#eda62a””#f42858””#393939” : color (Required)

request.description:
# Description

Updates information about Status.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-status/

# Description

Deletes Status.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-status/

urlencoded.description: Status ID to replace linked issues statuses.Issues which status are set to the deleted status will be set to the specied substitute status. : substituteStatusId (Required)

request.description:
# Description

Updates order about Status.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-order-of-status/

urlencoded.description: Status ID List to order them. You have to send all status of project. It has following restrictions as below.“Open” has to be first“Close” has to be last“In Progress” has to be before “Resolved” : statusId[]

request.description:
# Description

Returns list of Issue Types in the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-issue-type-list/

# Description

Adds new Issue Type to the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-issue-type/

# Description

Updates information about Issue Type.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-issue-type/

# Description

Deletes Issue Type.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-issue-type/

urlencoded.description: type ID to change linked issue : substituteIssueTypeId (Required)

request.description:
# Description

Returns list of Categories in the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-category-list/

# Description

Adds new Category to the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-category/

# Description

Updates information about Category.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-category/

# Description

Deletes Category.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-category/

# Description

Returns list of Versions/Milestones in the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-version-milestone-list/

# Description

Adds new Version/Milestone to the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-version-milestone/

# Description

Updates information about Version/Milestone.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-version-milestone/

# Description

Deletes Version.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-version/

# Description

Returns list of Custom Fields in the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-custom-field-list/

# Description

Adds new Custom Field to the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-custom-field/

urlencoded.description: Type ID of Custom field1: Text2: Sentence3: Number4: Date5: Single list6: Multiple list7: Checkbox8: Radio : typeId (Required)
Type ID to enable Custom fieldsempty=enable for all issue types : applicableIssueTypes[]
True to make the Custom field required : required

request.description:
# Description

Updates Custom Field.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-custom-field/

urlencoded.description: Type ID to enable Custom fieldsempty=enable for all issue types : applicableIssueTypes[]
True to make the Custom field required : required

request.description:
# Description

Deletes Custom Field.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-custom-field/

item.name: Add List Item for List Type Custom Field

request.description:
# Description

Adds new list item for list type custom field.
Only administrator can call this API if the option “Add items in adding or editing issues” is disabled in settings.
Calling API fails if specified custom field’s type is not a list.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-list-item-for-list-type-custom-field/

item.name: Update List Item for List Type Custom Field

request.description:
# Description

Updates list item for list type custom field.
Calling API fails if specified custom field’s type is not a list.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-list-item-for-list-type-custom-field/

item.name: Delete List Item for List Type Custom Field

request.description:
# Description

Deletes list item for list type custom field.
Calling API fails if specified custom field’s type is not a list.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-list-item-for-list-type-custom-field/

# Description

Gets list of Shared Files.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-shared-files/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Downloads the file.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-file/

# Description

Returns information about project disk usage.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-project-disk-usage/

# Description

Returns list of webhooks.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-webhooks/

# Description

Adds new webhook.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-webhook/

urlencoded.description: True to make all events notified : allEvent
Event ID to be notified : activityTypeIds[]

request.description:
# Description

Returns information about webhook.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-webhook/

# Description

Updates information about webhook.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-webhook/

urlencoded.description: True to make all events notified : allEvent
Event ID to be notified : activityTypeIds[]

request.description:
# Description

Deletes webhook.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-webhook/

# Description

Returns list of issues.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-issue-list/

query.description: Status IDAPI of status list for each project : statusId[]
Subtasking0: All1: Exclude Child Issue2: Child Issue3: Neither Parent Issue nor Child Issue4: Parent Issue : parentChild
True to make include Issue with Attachment : attachment
True to make include Issue with File : sharedFile
Order of the sort “asc” or “desc” default=“desc” : order
number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Returns number of issues.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/count-issue/

query.description: Subtasking0: All1: Exclude Child Issue2: Child Issue3: Neither Parent Issue nor Child Issue4: Parent Issue : parentChild
True to make include Issue with Attachment : attachment
True to make include Issue with File : sharedFile
Order of the sort “asc” or “desc” default=“desc” : order
number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Adds new issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-issue/

urlencoded.description: Attachment file ID(Post Attachment File returns) : attachmentId[]

request.description:
# Description

Returns information about issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-issue/

# Description

Updates information about issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-issue/

urlencoded.description: Attachment file ID(Post Attachment File returns) : attachmentId[]

request.description:
# Description

Deletes issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-issue/

# Description

Returns list of comments in issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-comment-list/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Adds a comment to the issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-comment/

urlencoded.description: Attachment file ID(Post Attachment File returns) : attachmentId[]

request.description:
# Description

Returns number of comments in issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/count-comment/

# Description

Returns information about comment.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-comment/

# Description

Delete comment.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-comment/

# Description

Updates content of comment.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-comment/

# Description

Returns the list of comment notifications.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-comment-notifications/

# Description

Adds notifications to the comment.
Only the user who added the comment can add notifications.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-comment-notification/

# Description

Returns the list of issue attachments.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-issue-attachments/

# Description

Downloads issue’s attachment file.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-issue-attachment/

# Description

Deletes an attachment of issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-issue-attachment/

# Description

Returns list of participants of an issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-issue-participant-list/

item.name: Get List of Linked Shared Files

request.description:
# Description

Returns the list of linked Shared Files to issues.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-linked-shared-files/

Links shared files to issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/link-shared-files-to-issue/

request.description:
# Description

Removes link to shared file from issue.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/remove-link-to-shared-file-from-issue/

# Description

Returns list of Wiki pages.

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-wiki-page-list/

query.description: Project ID or Project Key : projectIdOrKey

request.description:
# Description

Returns number of Wiki pages.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/count-wiki-page/

query.description: Project ID or Project Key : projectIdOrKey

request.description:
# Description

Returns list of tags that are used in the project.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-wiki-page-tag-list/

query.description: Project ID or Project Key : projectIdOrKey

request.description:
# Description

Adds new Wiki page.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-wiki-page/

urlencoded.description: True make to notify by Email : mailNotify

request.description:

Returns information about Wiki page.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-wiki-page/

Updates information about Wiki page.

request.description:

request.description:

Gets list of files attached to Wiki.

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-wiki-attachments/

# Description

Attaches file to Wiki

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/attach-file-to-wiki/

urlencoded.description: ID returned by send attachment API : attachmentId[]

request.description:
# Description

Downloads Wiki page’s attachment file.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-wiki-page-attachment/

Removes files attached to Wiki.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/remove-wiki-attachment/

item.name: Get List of Shared Files on Wiki

request.description:
# Description

Returns the list of Shared Files on Wiki.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-shared-files-on-wiki/

# Description

Links Shared Files to Wiki.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/link-shared-files-to-wiki/

item.name: Remove Link to Shared File from Wiki

request.description:
# Description

Removes link to shared file from Wiki.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/remove-link-to-shared-file-from-wiki/

# Description

Returns history of Wiki page.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-wiki-page-history/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Returns list of stars received on the Wiki page.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-wiki-page-star/

# Description

Adds star.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-star/

# Description

Returns own notifications.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-notification/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Returns number of Notifications.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/count-notification/

query.description: This parameter is optional. Set to false for unread notification count and true for already read notification count. : resourceAlreadyRead
This parameter is optional. Set this parameter to false to get unread notification count since the last time checked by user and true for already read notification count. : alreadyRead

request.description:
# Description

Resets unread Notification count.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/reset-unread-notification-count/

# Description

Changes notifications read.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/read-notification/

# Description

Returns list of Git repositories.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-git-repositories/

# Description

Returns Git repository.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-git-repository/

# Description

Returns list of pull requests.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-pull-request-list/

query.description: number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count

request.description:
# Description

Returns number of pull requests.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-number-of-pull-requests/

# Description

Adds pull requests.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-pull-request/

urlencoded.description: Branch name of merge base : base (required)
Assignee’s ID of pull request : assigneeId
User ID to send notification when pull request is added : notifiedUserId[]
ID returned by “Post Attachment File” API : attachmentId[]

request.description:
# Description

Returns pull reuqest.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-pull-request/

# Description

Updates pull requests.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-pull-request/

urlencoded.description: Assignee’s ID of pull request : assigneeId
User ID to send notification when pull request is added : notifiedUserId[]

request.description:
# Description

Returns list of pull request comments.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-pull-request-comment/

# Description

Adds comments on pull requests.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-pull-request-comment/

urlencoded.description: User ID to send notification when comment is added : notifiedUserId[]

item.name: Get Number of Pull Request Comments

request.description:
# Description

Returns number of comments on pull requests.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-number-of-pull-request-comments/

# Description

Updates pull request comment information.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/update-pull-request-comment-information/

item.name: Get List of Pull Request Attachment

request.description:
# Description

Returns list of attached files on pull requests.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-list-of-pull-request-attachment/

# Description

Downloads attached files on pull requests.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/download-pull-request-attachment/

# Description

Deletes attached files on pull requests.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/delete-pull-request-attachments/

# Description

Returns list of your watching issues.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-watching-list/

query.description: Order of the sort “asc” or “desc” default=“desc” : order
What to sort results by. The value “created”, “updated” or “issueUpdated” are allowed. default=“issueUpdated” : sort
Number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20 : count
Where to start returning records from the entire results. default=0 : offset

Whether the issues already read are retrieved or not. The all watching issues are returned if this parameter is omitted. The read watching issues are returned if true. The unread watching issues are returned if false. default=null : resourceAlreadyRead

request.description:
# Description

Returns the number of your watching issues.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/count-watching/

query.description: This parameter is optional. Set to false for unread watching count and true for already read watching count. : resourceAlreadyRead

This parameter is optional. Set this parameter to false to get unread watching count since the last time checked by user and true for already read watching count. When both alreadyRead and resourceAlreadyRead parameters set, resourceAlreadyRead will be ignored. : alreadyRead

request.description:
# Description

Returns the information about a watching.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/get-watching/

# Description

Adds a watching. User can add a own watching.

# Reference Url

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-watching/

urlencoded.description: Issue ID or Issue Key : issueIdOrKey (Required)

request.description:

request.description:

Adds new team.
You can’t use this API at backlog.com space.

https://developer.nulab.com/docs/backlog/api/2/add-team/
